data.name: Number Maze -- Play game Series #12
data.description:
Play game Series #12:
Number Maze

# Welcome In this kata, we'll playing with an Android game `Number Maze `. ![](https://files.gitter.im/myjinxin2015/Q8P7/blob) # Basic Rule You are given a `maze`. It's a `n x n` matrix. The goal of game is to fill in the numbers from `1 to N(N=n*n)` in the maze, and let every two adjacent numbers be neighbors(in 8 directions). ![](https://files.gitter.im/myjinxin2015/Bmsz/blob) As you can see, there are some initial numbers in the maze. These numbers can not be changed. You need to find a valid solution based on these numbers. Like this: ![](https://files.gitter.im/myjinxin2015/F6k4/blob) # Input - `maze`: 2D array of integer. The game map. The shape of maze is always be a square of `n x n`(3 <= n <= 10). In the maze, `0` means the empty grids, and other numbers mean the initial numbers. # Output 2D array of integer. A valid solution of the maze. # Note - All inputs are valid. - All testcases have at least one valid solution. - The number you need to fill in is from 1, not 0. That is, for a `3 x 3` maze, you need to fill in `1 to 9`, not `0 to 8` or `0 to 9`. - Please pay attention to the performance of your code. - You can search this game on web, download it and play(But I don't what's the English name of this game, sorry). But, I bet you can't pass the game before you write the correct solution for this Kata. ;-) # Play Games series: - [Play Tetris : Shape anastomosis](http://www.codewars.com/kata/56c85eebfd8fc02551000281) - [Play FlappyBird : Advance Bravely](http://www.codewars.com/kata/play-flappybird-advance-bravely) - [Play PingPong : Precise control](http://www.codewars.com/kata/57542b169a4524d7d9000b68) - [Play PacMan : Devour all](https://www.codewars.com/kata/575c29d5fcee86cb8b000136) - [Play PacMan 2: The way home](https://www.codewars.com/kata/575ed46e23891f67d90000d8) - [Ins and Outs](https://www.codewars.com/kata/576bbb41b1abc47b3900015e) - [Three Dots](https://www.codewars.com/kata/three-dots-play-game-series-number-8) - [Flou](https://www.codewars.com/kata/5a93754d0025e98fde000048) - [Switch the Bulb](https://www.codewars.com/kata/5a96064cfd57777828000187) - [Calculator: The game](https://www.codewars.com/kata/5aefb889d2ee276a73000063)
